body.label: Swapping Ada allocated for Tweag proposal to USDA and USDM
body.description: Securing the budgeted dollar value in equal USDA USDM allocations, while ADA-USD price is favorable.
justification: Intersect has committed to run a pilot with Tweag, for budget deliverable payments to be made with Cardano stablecoins.
Due to the lack of liquidity in Cardano stablecoins, we will use NBX and Anzens/Encryptus to perform OTC trades and then mint new USDA and USDM.
The destinations are wallets controlled by Cardano Development holding's via NBX's custodial service and Anzens custodial service.
